description: Long after humanity left Earth, a relentless virus seizes the Moon, reawakening the dormant relics of our planet, infusing them with life. In this rekindled age, a reign of supremacy and conflict dawns, and the original inhabitants of Earth, the animals, are compelled to wage war against the revived creations of humanity. Thus, the tale of Earth's final conflict unfolds â€“ a war to end all wars.
name: The great battle of Shark Monkey Squirrel Dinossaur Bird Bee
